channel.title: Diffents questions
channel.description:
hi me again not long time since last time XD since i didnt get answar on my last question i take that like i cant do it...(make u can use a range to cook food on) but i've some new questions for u guys :D
1.is that possible to make a new skill and if how?
2.how do i make a door?
3.same as last time cuz i couldnt understand the base... how do i do so if i use a item like chiels on a uncut gem then i'll get an cut gem?
that all for me ;D hope u guys can help me :D

@Fox0wnage wrote:

Like example if you don’t want hunter, replace picture with your new skill picture and work on it.

item.title: Diffents questions
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

For the dorr, I’ve never made a door but if you go into the config folder, you should find doors.cfg, mines has instructions at the top of the file let me copy and paste them here…

//X,Y IS WHERE DOOR IS //Door state 0 = closed 1 = open. //FACE: 0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH //ADDED 7 door as a example -bakatool //FACE = FACE BEGIN WITH //FACEOPEN = FACE OPENED DOOR //FACECLOSED = FACE CLOSED DOOR //HEIGHT 0 = GROUND LVL, 1 IS UP LADDER, 2 IS UP UP LADDER, 3 = UNDERGROUND I THINK.

So example: // XCoord YCoord Id FaceO FaceC Face State Height door = 2726 3368 1533 -2 -3 -3 1 0

Hope I helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Diffents questions
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Alright it is very possible to make a new skill, but if you are still stuck on the questions below…I suggest that you work in coding a bit more until you become more advanced.

I’ll answer #3.
Alright, now in your client.java you should find something like this: (use ctrl+f to search)
Serch this // Use item on item or case 53:
If your using a blank source, you’d have to make the entire code by your self. If your using a premade source then it should be there.
Underneath if (!playerHasItem(itemUsed) || !playerHasItem(useWith)) { break; }
Say you wanted to combine potions or something do this:

//magic potion if(((itemUsed == 3046) && (otherItem == 3046))){ deleteItem(3046, getItemSlot(3046), 1); deleteItem(3046, getItemSlot(3046), 1); addItem(3044, 1); addItem(229, 1); sM("You have combined the liquid into 2 doses."); }

So just like that just make it that it uses a chisel on a gem, it deletes the gem and replaces it with the cut gem.

Read full topic
